div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of March 27, 1891. [CONCERNING LINDHEIMER AS A CANDIDATE]

body.p: Mr. Jacob Lindheimer is Democratic nominee for South Town Collector. Mr. Lindheimer's name was placed on the ticket without solicitation on his part. He is a young married man, well known and well connected, and is engaged in the wholesale liquor business at 3031 Archer Ave. He has been a resident of Chicago for sixteen years and can be commended as an active, energetic and intelligent business man.
